intro.title: The Mystery of the Lost Repository
story: One morning, you wake up to find your gopher friend in a panic. His favorite open-source project has vanished from the internet! The repository that held years of collaborative work is nowhere to be found.

Your gopher friend explains that the project was crucial for the gopher community - it contained tools that helped gophers build their burrows more efficiently. Without it, many gophers will struggle with their construction projects.

There are rumors about what happened. Some say it was accidentally deleted during a server migration. Others whisper about a rival community of moles who might have sabotaged it. There's even talk of a mysterious figure known only as 'The Archivist' who collects lost code.

options.text: Let's investigate the server migration theory - maybe we can recover it from backups!
The mole conspiracy sounds intriguing. Time to go underground and ask some questions.
This 'Archivist' character sounds like they might know something. Let's track them down.

server-investigation.title: Digital Detective Work
story: You and your gopher friend head to the data center where the servers are housed. The building is massive, with rows upon rows of blinking lights and humming machines.

After some smooth talking (and a box of donuts for the security guard), you gain access to the server logs. Your gopher friend's tiny paws fly across the keyboard as he searches through terabytes of data.
Suddenly, he squeaks with excitement! He's found traces of the repository in an old backup system. But there's a problem - the backup is encrypted, and you need the key.

options.text: Try to crack the encryption using your combined programming skills.
Search for the system administrator who might have the encryption key.

mole-conspiracy.title: Underground Investigation
story: You follow your gopher friend into a network of tunnels beneath the city. The underground community is bustling with activity - rabbits, moles, and even a few badgers going about their business.
After asking around, you're directed to a shadowy mole bar called 'The Dirty Spade'. Inside, the atmosphere is tense. Several moles eye you suspiciously as you enter.
The bartender, a gruff old mole with one eye, leans in close. 'You're asking dangerous questions,' he whispers. 'But I might know something... for the right price.'

options.text: Offer to trade information - maybe they need help with their own tech problems.
This feels like a trap. Let's get out of here and try another approach.

find-archivist.title: The Mysterious Collector
story: Your search for The Archivist leads you to an old library on the outskirts of town. The building looks abandoned, but your gopher friend's keen nose detects recent activity.
Inside, you discover a vast collection of old computers, servers, and backup drives. Everything is meticulously organized and labeled. This is definitely The Archivist's lair.
A figure emerges from the shadows - an elderly owl wearing thick glasses. 'I've been expecting you,' she hoots. 'Yes, I have your repository. But knowledge this valuable doesn't come free.'

options.text: Ask what The Archivist wants in exchange for the repository.
Try to convince her that the repository belongs to the community.

crack-encryption.title: Code Breaking
story: You and your gopher friend work through the night, trying different approaches to break the encryption. Empty coffee cups pile up around you.
Just as you're about to give up, your gopher friend remembers something - the original developer always used references to famous gopher holes in their passwords!
With this clue, you successfully decrypt the backup and recover the lost repository. The gopher community rejoices as their valuable tools are restored!

options.text: Time to celebrate with a well-deserved rest.

find-admin.title: The Helpful Admin
story: You track down the system administrator, a friendly beaver named Bob, at a local coffee shop. He's horrified to learn about the missing repository.
'Oh no! That must have been my mistake during the migration!' Bob exclaims. 'But don't worry, I always keep extra backups. Let me get my emergency USB drive.'
Bob helps you restore the repository from his personal backup. Crisis averted! Your gopher friend does a happy dance as the code comes back online.

options.text: Thank Bob and celebrate the successful recovery.

mole-trade.title: Underground Deal
story: The moles admit they didn't steal the repository, but they know who did - a rogue badger who's been hoarding code to sell on the dark web.
In exchange for your help setting up their own version control system, they give you the badger's location and a plan to recover the stolen code.
The confrontation with the badger is tense, but when faced with the united front of gophers and moles working together, he reluctantly returns the repository.

options.text: Return the repository to its rightful place online.

escape-moles.title: A Narrow Escape
story: You and your gopher friend make a hasty exit from the mole bar. As you emerge from the tunnels, your friend suggests a new approach.
'Maybe we were thinking about this wrong,' he says. 'What if the repository wasn't stolen or deleted? What if it was just moved?'
Following this hunch, you discover the repository was simply migrated to a new platform with a different URL. A simple redirect later, and everything is back to normal!

options.text: Laugh about the wild goose chase and head home.

archivist-deal.title: The Exchange
story: The Archivist wants something unusual - she's been searching for the source code to an ancient gopher game that was thought to be lost forever.
Your gopher friend's eyes light up. 'My grandmother might have that! She never throws anything away!' Sure enough, after a quick trip to Grandma Gopher's burrow, you return with the game.
The Archivist is delighted. She not only returns your repository but also gives you access to her entire archive. 'For friends of digital preservation,' she says with a wink.

options.text: Accept her generous offer and restore the repository.

convince-archivist.title: A Change of Heart
story: You passionately explain how the repository helps gophers all over the world build better homes and communities. Your gopher friend adds personal stories of families helped by the code.
The Archivist's expression softens. 'I... I didn't realize. I've been so focused on preserving code that I forgot why it matters - to help others.'
She returns the repository immediately and offers to help maintain backups for the community. 'No code should be lost again,' she declares.

options.text: Thank The Archivist and restore the repository.

mystery-solved.title: Case Closed
story: The repository is back online, and gophers everywhere can continue their building projects. Your friend is hailed as a hero in the gopher community.
As a thank you, the community gifts you both lifetime supplies of your favorite snacks and a special badge that reads 'Digital Detective Extraordinaire'.
Your gopher friend grins and says, 'Same time next week for another adventure?'
